entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 08:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.8°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
